mapper.insert: insert into quest (q_div, q_d_date, q_wm_start, q_wm_end, u_id) values (#{q_div}, #{q_d_date}, #{q_wm_start}, #{q_wm_end}, #{u_id})
mapper.update: update quest_content set qc_compl_yn = 'Y', updated_at = NOW() where qc_id = #{qc_id}

foreach.if: update quest_content set qc_content = #{item.qc_content}, qc_compl_yn = #{item.qc_compl_yn}, updated_at = NOW() and qc_id = #{item.qc_id}

mapper.select: select qc_compl_yn, count(*) as cnt from quest q left join quest_content qc on (qc.q_id = q.q_id) where u_id = #{u_id} and q_div = #{q_div} group by qc_compl_yn
